channel.title: Adding models help please (Mainly Capes)
channel.description: I have a couple model questions. 1. When adding a cape what animation do I use? 2. How do I fix my items appearing invisible? 3. How do I make bows shoot and 2h weapons be 2 handed?

item.title: Adding models help please (Mainly Capes)
item.dc:creator: @skander1345 skander1345
item.description:
@skander1345 wrote:

2h weapons, search for 2h on source and add id i think…
items appearing invisible happens to me sometimes… i will watch this topic until someone solves it, and you can download the cape ready to use. without touching anything

Read full topic
